head.title: Swap pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to swap pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files. Manage content of PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio diagrams, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Swap {{FileFormatUp}} pages
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} applications with advanced document processing. Swap pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files in order to control business information.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} features
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a document processing library supporting 50+ file types, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. Include our product to your applications and be ready to merge, split, extract, rearrange, swap, and remove pages, in all popular document formats.

more_features.title: Advanced document management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a powerful toolkit for efficiently processing over 50 popular file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge different document types
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio drawings, images, and archive files. Apply customization settings for precise output.

feature_2.title: Rearrange document structure
feature_2.content: Modify document layout by moving, swapping, or deleting pages to organize content more effectively.

feature_3.title: Adjust page orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to predefined angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientations.

feature_4.title: Extract selected pages
feature_4.content: Choose specific pages or page ranges and save them as a separate document.

formats.title: Swap pages in multiple formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file types, making it easy to modify documents with precision.

operations.title: Main features
operations.description: Explore the key capabilities of our document processing library.

examples.comment_4: Save result file to new location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to swap {{FileFormatUp}} pages, controlling document content. Integrate efficient document processing into your {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_2: Provide number of pages to be swapped.
content.step_4: Save the result to desired location.

code_1.title: Swap the first and the last {{FileFormatUp}} pages
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to swap a {{FileFormatUp}} pages in a few simple steps.
